name: Uniken Systems
overview:
UNIKEN is a technology solution innovation firm â€“ an evolving, dynamic, innovation ecosystem that creates innovation solutions for fundamental problems that impact human lives. It was started in 2003 by senior professionals from Infosys, GE, TCS & Motorola in Boston (USA). In 2004, the UNIKEN INNOVATION CENTER was set up in Pune (INDIA). Our product designers, engineers, technologists and researchers at this R&D center and have strong academic backgrounds in computer science, electronics and management.

We develop cutting-edge, innovative technologies in the following areas:

Information Security and Biometrics Embedded Systems Control Systems Intelligent Software Systems And apply these technology innovations to solve problems in the following domains:

Banking, Financial Services and Insurance Media and Entertainment Healthcare Education/Knowledge Delivery Enterprise Security Telecom
